Headline: Blue Line Delays
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cicero. Service is resuming.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are running w/residual delays and congestion following an earlier mechanical problem near Cicero. Service is resuming.

Trains are moving and normal service is being restored.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Blue Line Service Delayed at Jackson
ShortDescription: Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to an unauthorized person on the tracks. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Blue Line trains are standing at Jackson due to an unauthorized person on the tracks.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
